drawer-custom.description: Online consultation of articles from several thousand electronic scientific journals available in full text as well as databases.

info-card.title: "Research never stops"
info-card.p1: BiblioMap reflects CNRS's online consultations of digital resources via the bibCNRS portal. This digital tool provides access to the full text of articles from several thousand electronic scientific journals and to bibliographic databases.
info-card.img1-alt: BibCNRS, the portal to CNRS electronic documentary resources
info-card.img1-caption: The specialized access portal platforms are managed by Inist-CNRS.
info-card.p2: The visualizations available in BiblioMap are made possible by the use of ezPAARSE, an open-source software developed by COUPERIN, l'INIST-CNRS and the Universit√© de Lorraine as a pilot site. AnalogIST is the Higher Education and Research collaborative portal dedicated to measuring the use of electronic resources. The developments associated with this collaboration are available as free software within ezPAARSE-project.
info-card.comment: Note: the location of consultations shown on the map is deliberately approximate.
